name: Star Spawn Larva Mage
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained

traits.*3 beams, +3 bonus to each damage roll: *3 beams, +3 bonus to each damage roll
traits.Return to Worms: When the larva mage is reduced to 0 hit points, it breaks apart into a swarm of insects in the same space. Unless the swarm is destroyed, the larva mage reforms from it 24 hours later.

actions.Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d10 + 3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 19+1d10 + 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.
actions.Plague of Worms (Recharge 6): Each creature other than a star spawn within 10 feet of the larva mage must make a DC 19+1d10 + 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure the target takes 22 (5d8) necrotic damage and is blinded and restrained by masses of swarming worms. The affected creature takes 22 (5d8) necrotic damage at the start of each of the larva mage's turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

options.Cantrip (Costs 2 Actions): The larva mage casts one cantrip.
options.Slam (Costs 2 Actions): The larva mage makes one slam attack.
options.Feed (Costs 3 Actions): Each creature restrained by the larva mage's Plague of Worms takes 13 (3d8) necrotic damage, and the larva mage gains 6 temporary hit points.
